jenkins.plugins.shiningpanda.builders.Py.command: #!/bin/bash # ls "$MOZHARNESSHOME" fails if the variable is set via Jenkin's node configuration export MOZHARNESSHOME=/Users/mozilla/tools/mozharness export MINIDUMP_STACKWALK=/Users/mozilla/tools/minidump_stackwalk export TREEHERDER_CONFIG=/Users/mozilla/testing/treeherder_config python ./run_media_tests.py --installer-url http://pf-jenkins.qa.mtv2.mozilla.com:8080/job/firefox-nightly-mac/ws/releases/firefox-latest-nightly.en-US.mac.dmg --symbols-url http://pf-jenkins.qa.mtv2.mozilla.com:8080/job/symbols-nightly-mac/ws/releases/firefox-latest-nightly.en-US.mac.crashreporter-symbols.zip --test-timeout 400 -c config/treeherder_submission.py --log-level=debug --job-name='MSE YouTube Playback' --job-symbol=y --tests ./firefox_media_tests/playback/youtube/manifest.ini --treeherder-url='https://treeherder.allizom.org/' --treeherder-credentials=$TREEHERDER_CONFIG/treeherder-staging-credentials.json --s3-credentials=$TREEHERDER_CONFIG/s3-credentials.json if [ ! -d ./logs ]; then exit 1; fi if [ "$(grep --count 'Marionette: success' logs/log_info.log)" -eq "0" ]; then exit 1; fi
